summary: REQ-6 is partially implemented: the two explicitly named UI locations show updated branding text, but the diff summary does not provide enough evidence to confirm that *all* user-facing occurrences of the exact string "Moritz Care Home" were replaced across the entire frontend source.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all user-facing occurrences of the exact text "Moritz Care Home" with "Maui Lane Care Home" across the frontend UI (global removal of the string from frontend source).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows updates in the two specified pages, but does not demonstrate a repo-wide/global replacement or a source-wide absence of the exact string "Moritz Care Home". With truncated diffs and only a subset of files shown, remaining occurrences cannot be ruled out.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project metadata/state describing building a separate Maui Lane Care Home application.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to replacing the exact branding text string in the frontend UI; modifying project state/metadata is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to a generated/aggregated frontend file summary index.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for maintaining or changing summary/index files; only UI text replacement was requested.
